pullrequest.title: Added option to show or hide toolbars and rearranged menu

content.raw: should we let the users show the toolbars when they are in model editor mode? otherwise they won't be able to create joints or manipulate links if they entered model editor with the toolbar hidden
content.html: should we let the users show the toolbars when they are in model editor mode? otherwise they won't be able to create joints or manipulate links if they entered model editor with the toolbar hidden
